name: Aim Lab
description: The ultimate FPS training solution: Aim Lab blends cutting-edge performance tracking and analytics with machine learning to make you better, faster.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 and up Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 and up Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
